# safariDomains

**Instance Property**

An array of domain strings for use with Safari-based hotspot authentication.

## Declaration

```swift
final var safariDomains: [String] { get set }
```

## Discussion

The containing app can specify these domains when it intends to use the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/SafariServices/SFSafariViewController] class for interacting with the hotspot service provider’s web application during hotspot authentication.
title: safariDomains
